overview: It is a collaborative project that was developed from the documentation collected in extensive travel through four Latin American cities: Mexico City (Mexico), Buenos Aires (Argentina), La Paz (Bolivia), and Lima (Peru). The result is a new journey constructed with sound and animation. This reconstruction was made from the memories ot the journey to Lima, from the interaction with each city and with epistolary communication.
tagline: When I send a letter I feel time has another meaning
title: Postales en movimiento: Lima
